gen:link.msg:message: v6453_m: ldr_v0006: if CRR Waiver (T 99.00, r0090) is not set to [No (Article 7 CRR Waiver)] then T02.00 row r0110 must be filled in --> [T 99.00] if {{T 99.00, r0090, c0010}} != [eba_ZZ:x64] then ({{T 02.00.a, r0110, c0010}} != empty and {{T 02.00.a, r0110, c0020}} != empty) FAILS because if ({eba_fmt:interval($a)} != xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x64')) then ((not(empty({eba_fmt:interval($b)}) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('','b'))) and not(empty({eba_fmt:interval($c)}) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('','c'))))) else (true()) is not true

v6453_m: [T 99.00] if {{T 99.00, r0090, c0010}} != [eba_ZZ:x64] then ({{T 02.00.a, r0110, c0010}} != empty and {{T 02.00.a, r0110, c0020}} != empty) FAILS because if ({eba_fmt:interval($a)} != xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x64')) then ((not(empty({eba_fmt:interval($b)}) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('','b'))) and not(empty({eba_fmt:interval($c)}) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('','c'))))) else (true()) is not true
